pr_title: documentation: Making things a little clearer

timeline.message: documentation: Making things a little clearer

timeline.bodyText:
I disagree with the addition of the comma. I suggest one of these, instead:

"remember we are stretched thin",
"remember that we are stretched thin",
"remember: We are stretched thin".

Also, I wonder if the reader is actually supposed already to know what it is told to remember.
timeline.author: Cernelius
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@ code.
 
 Add comments to your own PR to indicate where more work will be done.
 
-Be open to suggestion and remember we are stretched thing and will likely
+Be open to suggestions and remember, we are stretched thin and will likely
